duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and train the Milling Department to ensure operations meet or exceed safety, quality, production, cost, and delivery metrics.
Develop training programs and improvement initiatives for milling processes, act as an SME, and train production staff.
Ensure compliance with safety, GMPs, and food safety regulations, and oversee efficient execution of milling operations.
Collaborate with Maintenance team and Plant Leadership to drive manufacturing strategies and milling initiatives.
Drive preventative and autonomous maintenance solutions, provide training, and oversee yield and throughput goals in the milling department.
Manage housekeeping, maintain positive departmental morale, and inform Management Team of any issues affecting production and quality.

education_certification.credential: At least 15 years of Milling experience
At least 5 years of Supervisory/Management experience
Knowledge of working in a Union environment (preferred)
Demonstrated leadership and change management skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
